automatedUnnullingAt.description: The date and time when the null route is to be deactivated. The date and time should be specified using the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssÂ±hh:mm (with time zone designator) or yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ (UTC). If this field is not present then the null route will not be automatically removed.

comment.description: A comment to be stored with the null route (e.g. null route reason)

ticketId.description: A reference to be stored with the null route
